title: House for sale in Colombo - 05
details:
Highly Residential Property in Narahenpita
House built on 17.44 perches of land consisting 3 Bed Room and 2 Bath Rooms, Dining room, Living area, 2 Car Parking, & 6.5 perch garden space
Located in calm and quiet, decent residential area
Close to Super Market, private Hospital and School

Price Rs. 175 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information
Pan Global Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd.
